extendedInfo.description: This is the ads supported version of the Popular Active Apps which is also a replacement for Samsung Task Manager / Program Monitor that come with Samsung Touchwiz Launcher that works with any launchers. It has several features not available on this version, for more information on what is not available, you can check the Help File from the menu in the application. Important Notice: There is a built-in mechanism to prevent updating widget when you are not on your home screen to save battery. This in turn also cause no of active apps not showing up correctly.  e.q. There is active apps shown on widget but when you open up it's not there. To prevent this from happening you can turn the update to 10 seconds or lower( Lower might consume a bit more battery ). 15 / 10 would be the most appropriate. Please email me instead if you have this kind of issue, i won't be able to reply from the comments. Thanks. As the concept is different from other Task Manager/Task Killer, Please read the Get Starting Guide and About Active Apps to get a better understanding on how it works. Here is the description: Active Apps is an application which monitor an unusual activity that consumes battery or tracking the application that has been put on standby mode. This is important because some application might not be coded properly. Therefore, even though it has been put on standby mode (Pressing Home) they are still running, eating CPU and hence your device's battery. E.q. browser and gallery apps in the Early Galaxy Tab rom even though it's closed or stand by, it's still consuming battery. However, the scenario is not limited to only Samsung Galaxy tab. Generally, it applies to all android phone. How does it differ from other task manager? Unlike other task managers, which shows irrelevant applications, Active apps is simple. It only shows programs that have tasks running and possibly consuming CPU. Therefore at one glance you can decide what to do.Features:- Tracking application that has been put on standby and running (I called them Active Apps).- Easy Switch tasks for Active Application from Main Application or Widget- Widget to show Number of Active Applications running which may consume CPUs/Battery- Provide package manager to manage your installed application(Faster than stock Application Manager). - Provide views of Ram, Apps that using RAM and free ram function.- Provide view of Storage both internal SD and external SD, data and database.- Provide theme capability - More theme coming soon -- Provide UI Customization. You can mix and match color to find your desire look.- Provide 1x1, 1x2 Active Application widget and 1x1, 1x2 Active Ram widget with stylish and beautiful pop up style. - Provide a flexible customization on many areas of the application and widgets.Featured on Xda-Developers: http://www.xda-developers.com/android/samsung-active-apps-widget-for-android/If you have any issues pertaining to the application, kindly send me an email at elnoxvie@gmail.com.  Changes in v1.3.5- Switching pages is now much more smoother.- Adding help files on changing widget theme.- Fix default Active Apps Widget color not matching. - Change the default widget size from 14dip to 13dip as it's too small. Changes v1.3.1.- Auto load Packages on Package Manager. The load button is now replaced to  perform sort.- Active Apps Page can now be sorted based on App name or CPU Usage, you can set it under setting. - Correct some typo errors. - Under Storage Page, Auto Hide information for phones that don't have personal data and external storage.Hope you guys like this release. :)

reviews.title: Excellent App!!!
reviews.comment: Still a great app!  Just got a phone with Jelly Bean and this App still works better than any of the stock program managers.  Fantastic job, wish they had more skins.
reviews.author: Adrian Hatley

reviews.comment: Keeps saying 1 or 2 apps running but when you open it there\'s nothing after exit it then shows 0 as it shoult. Pretty pointless. Nexus s 2.3.4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Somethings Amiss
reviews.comment: Something doesn\'t jive.   I installed the Ads version then decided to pay the $1.54.  The next thing I know the paid version is BUGGING me that I have an illegal license and need to go to G Play to purchase but I just did!!!  Going back to the Ads version for now.
reviews.author: Joe Faracchio

reviews.title: Wow.
reviews.comment: This is nothing compared to the paid version. It has appearance setting a mile long plus way more other important settings. Awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UI Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: Switching the page is very hard. Still dosnt work properly.  Should give more sorting options. Should also give optipn to disable any app permanently.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Was looking for an application monitor since Samsung doesn\'t include it with their new phones now and their app website no longer has it listed. This does exactly what I want!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A definite 5 stars app, it is the perfect task manager for my phone(Y)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: it is excellent , free of bugs , best task manager for android and not power hungry , well done , to all non touchwiz phones as me this is so much recommended!
reviews.author: Jean Bassil

reviews.comment: I was looking for a replacement for stock task manager and this is it. Very easy to use and works very well. Will buy paid ver if it doesn\'t kill batt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use Galaxy\'s Task Mgr
reviews.comment: Just upgrd from Galaxy 551 to S2 & dwnldd this app cause so many complained of no longer havg Samsungs Task Mgr only to discover it on my new S2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: It a battery hog. The task killer doesn\'t workand it using more RAM then any app I have. Using EVO 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good, very similar to the one in Samsung\'s Android devices but is lacking in the beautiful design Samsung offers. Try to work on the design department. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app...always wanted something lyk this...plz update more themes asap....widget look not dat cool....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, but looks awful!
reviews.comment: Please update look and feel or make it customizable please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Why would an app dev steal the Touchwiz task manager and then try to sell it on the market. Shame on you!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working properly
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t kill programmes successfully. It says some apps are still open, even after the refresh time. Please fix so I can give you 5 stars!  Thanks.  :)
reviews.author: Ashraf H

reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
reviews.comment: It lists active apps OK but when you hit \'End\' it just removes the app from list so you think you\'ve killed it. But then if you go to App drawer under settings you can see the App is still running. Waste of space and resources - would be good if s/o can write an App to kill this!
reviews.author: Marco Bub

reviews.title: Was Awesome
reviews.comment: But now it wont kill apps. Before its was the best app i can asked for. Kill apps & unistall apps & also clear the ram. Hope u fix it soon :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: tabs
reviews.comment: useful app but it would be better to have tabs for switching pages instead of \'hard to tap\' small arrows and sliding.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: HTC Wildfire. The menu is kinda\' slow, and the ram cleaner warnings aren\'t fully visible, but when it comes to clearing ram it\'s one of the best.
reviews.author: A Google User
